name: Going to bed
description:
1 / 2 / 3 - Toggle phone functionality

Left Mouse Button - Interact

Survive the night by downloading the best anti-haunting app on the market, just make sure you don't get caught by the spookies first by using your phone's flashlight or by hiding. Be careful though, if you hide too often the spookies will cattototototoch on to your tricks!

This is totally not a blatant rip-off of Five Nights at Freddy's by the way

Made for Weekly Game Jam 144 | Theme: In the dark
